applications.title: Message in a Bottle
applications.description: A Message management library for LOVE 0.7.0 aiming to be unobtrusive and easy to use.

applications.title: Blurt!
applications.description: A realtime shoutbox feed utilizing Node.js and Mongodb.

applications.title: Roster DNS Management
applications.description: This is a software suite to help manage and maintain BIND DNS config files.

applications.title: Lovely Expressions
applications.description: A paint-esque program. Supports color sampling and animations.

applications.title: LOVEshow
applications.description: A simple photo viewer. It automatically finds all photos in the current directory and displays them in a horizontal line.

applications.title: SPH
applications.description: This is a CUDA implementation of Smooth Particle Hyrodynamics.
